They will attain five kinds of karmic rewards in this life.
First, they will be reborn in the world with past lives.
Their eloquence will be unobstructed and they will always attain purity.
Second, it will enable them to attain the Buddha eye.
Third, wherever they are born, they will always attain the thirty-two marks, no different from me.
Fourth, they will always be in the presence of the Buddha.
Fifth, wherever they go in the world, it will all shake.

Excellent, excellent! You do this for the sake of all sentient beings, to bring them peace and happiness.
